      • transferFunc

        double transferFunc​(double x)
        Abstract method that defines transfer function to be used by an Perceptron.
        Parameters:
        x - input value
        Returns:
        output value of the function.

      • transferDeriv

        double transferDeriv​(double x)
        Abstract method that defines derivative of the defined transfer function for Perceptron.
        Parameters:
        x - input value
        Returns:
        value returned by the derivative function.

      • transferFuncAtOutput

        default double transferFuncAtOutput​(double x)
        If any different transfer function is supposed to be used at output layer. Default definition is the common transfer function.
        Parameters:
        x - input value.
        Returns:
        output value.

      • transferDerivAtOutput

        default double transferDerivAtOutput​(double x)
        Derivative function of output layer transfer function if different transfer function is used than common.
        Parameters:
        x - input value.
        Returns:
        value returned by the derivative funtion.

      • calcDelErrorAtOutputLayer

        default double calcDelErrorAtOutputLayer​(int node_pos,
                                         PerceptronLayer layer,
                                         double targetValue)
        Calculates the delta error function at output layer node.
        Parameters:
        node_pos - node position of working node.
        layer - Output layer needed to be passed.
        targetValue - target value the node is supposed to give.
        Returns:
        error calculated at specified output node.

      • inputToWeightDeriv

        default double inputToWeightDeriv​(int host_node_pos,
                                  int dest_node_pos,
                                  PerceptronLayer layer)
                           throws NoSuchLayerException
        To calculate the partial derivative of input w.r.t. weight of link between node defined by host_node_position to the node specified by the dest_node_pos in the previous layer. Default defined by Gradient Decent calculus.
        Parameters:
        host_node_pos - node position of current node.
        dest_node_pos - node position of linked node in previous layer.
        layer - in which the current node is.
        Returns:
        value of partial derivative calculation.
        Throws:
        NoSuchLayerException - if layer is Input layer as there is no linked previous layer of it.

      • activationToInputDeriv

        default double activationToInputDeriv​(int node_pos,
                                      PerceptronLayer layer)
        To calculate the partial derivative of activation of node w.r.t. net input received. Default defined by Gradient Decent calculus.
        Parameters:
        node_pos - specifies node in the layer.
        layer - specifies the layer.
        Returns:
        value determined by the derivative calculation.

      • errorToActivationDeriv

        default double errorToActivationDeriv​(int host_node_pos,
                                      PerceptronLayer layer)
        To calculate the partial derivative of error w.r.t. activation of a node defined by host_node_position in a layer. Default defined by Gradient Decent calculus.
        Parameters:
        host_node_pos - specifies the node.
        layer - specifies the working layer.
        Returns:
        derivative calculation final value.

      • errorToBiasDeriv

        default double errorToBiasDeriv​(int host_node_pos,
                                PerceptronLayer layer)
        To calculate the partial derivative of error w.r.t. bias of node defined by host_node_position in a layer. Default defined by Gradient Decent calculus.
        Parameters:
        host_node_pos - specifies the node.
        layer - specifies the layer.
        Returns:
        value of partial derivative calculation.

      • errorToWeightDeriv

        default double errorToWeightDeriv​(int host_node_pos,
                                  int dest_node_pos,
                                  PerceptronLayer layer)
                           throws NoSuchLayerException
        To calculate the partial derivative of error w.r.t. weight of link between node defined by host_node_position to the node specified by the dest_node_pos in the previous layer. Default defined by Gradient Decent calculus.
        Parameters:
        host_node_pos - node position of current node.
        dest_node_pos - node position of linked node in previous layer.
        layer - in which the current node is.
        Returns:
        value of partial derivative calculation.
        Throws:
        NoSuchLayerException - if layer is Input layer as there is no linked previous layer of it.

      • rmsError

        default double rmsError​(double[] actual,
                        double[] calculated)
                 throws InvalidArgumentVectorSize
        Calculates the rms Error between values of two floating point vectors.
        Parameters:
        actual - value vector
        calculated - value vector
        Returns:
        rms error calculated
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentVectorSize - on mismatch of argument sizes.
